text: Hancock County is the name of ten counties in the United States. All are named for John Hancock who was a leader in the American Revolution. The counties are: * Hancock County, Georgia * Hancock County, Illinois * Hancock County, Indiana * Hancock County, Iowa * Hancock County, Kentucky * Hancock County, Maine * Hancock County, Mississippi * Hancock County, Ohio * Hancock County, Tennessee * Hancock County, West Virginia == Formerly == * Winston County, Alabama, named Hancock County until 1858
title: Hancock County
